column1:
ううむ。既定のファン人数に届かなかったか。
『スターリットシーズン』はここまでのようだね
column2:
Hmm. Looks like we didn't reach our fan 
benchmarks. Our Starlit Season is over.
column5:
We didn't reach the set number of fans, huh?
Looks like this is the end of the Starlit Season.

column1:
ルミナスの挑戦……他事務所との合同ユニットは
やはり簡単ではなかったか……
column2:
The challenges of Luminous... A joint unit with 
other agencies really wasn't easy after all...
column5:
Luminous Challenge... A joint unit with other
agencies really wasn't easy after all...

column1:
残念だが、現時点をもって、
このプロジェクトは解散するしかあるまい……
column2:
I'ts unfortunate, but as of now, I'm afraid we
have no choice but to suspend the project...
column5:
Unfortunately, as of this moment,
this project has no choice but to disband.

column1:
アイドルや関係者には私から謝罪しておこう。
……ひどい顔をしている。君もしっかり休むといい
column2:
I'll apologize to the idols and everyone involved. 
...You look awful. You should get some good rest.
column5:
I'll apologize to the idols and people involved.
...You look awful. You should get some rest too
